item.title: Navigate in ReactJS using React V4 Router
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: If you are building a large single page application, there might come a time when you will need to add routes to different pages. Unlike traditional routes, adding routes in ReactJS does not trigger a page reload. This makes your SPA extremely fast and feels more like an actual application rather than a simple website.
